pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Wednesday, February 8, 2023 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

National Capital Region, Canada

Private meetings

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the National Caucus meeting.

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

3:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Premier of Prince Edward Island, Dennis King.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting

7:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks at a Black History Month reception. The Minister of Housing and Diversity and Inclusion, Ahmed Hussen, and the Minister for Women and Gender Equality and Youth, Marci Ien, will also deliver remarks.

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 6:45 p.m.
  • Media interested in participating can contact media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca for details.
